scripts.bootstrap: npm run _tmp_preinstall && npm i && npm run link:cli
scripts.link:cli: cd packages/cli && npm rm -g prisma4-multi-tenant && npm link
scripts.link:remove: npm ls -g && npm rm -g prisma4-multi-tenant @prisma4-multi-tenant/client @prisma4-multi-tenant/shared && npm ls -g
scripts.test: yarn run test:cli && yarn run test:client
scripts._tmp_preinstall: rm -rf packages\cli\build && mkdir packages\cli\build && call >> packages\cli\build\index.js
